alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 28 at 1:26PM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Onondaga and Madison counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4323 7577 4330 7576 4333 7581 4330 7581 4331 7588 4327 7586 4316 7588 4315 7579 4317 7576 4323 7573 TIME Y22M12D19T1800Z-Y22M12D20T0000Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
